definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: Make sure you have anti-tank and anti-air support for your Artillery.
sentences.chinese: 确保你的炮兵拥有反坦克和防空支援。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the traumatizing effects of an anti tank missile.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察某型反坦克导弹对犬的致伤效应。

sentences.english: Tank and Spank, moderate healing intensiveness.
sentences.chinese: 反坦克和巴掌，中度愈合密集。

sentences.english: The anti-tank rifleman is able to attack vehicles and destroy them with a light anti-armor weapon.
sentences.chinese: 反坦克兵可以使用轻型反坦克武器攻击并摧毁载具。

sentences.english: MG would mainly be used to destroy the point target and tanks.
sentences.chinese: MD530MG主要用于攻击点目标和反坦克。

sentences.english: It was not my plan to become an anti-tank artillery man.
sentences.chinese: 最初我并没有打算成为一名反坦克炮兵。

sentences.english: ATGMs alone cannot be expected to bear the burden of the MBT threat.
sentences.chinese: 不能单单指望反坦克导弹来对付主战坦克的威胁。

sentences.english: An AT Gun by its self is easy meat for a sniper.
sentences.chinese: 一个单独的反坦克炮简直就是狙击手的活靶子。

sentences.english: In order to destroy the AA emplacements , you'll need to first deal with the anti-tank fortifications.
sentences.chinese: 为了破坏机管局进驻，你需要先与反坦克防御工事。

sentences.english: The target sensitivity of projectile (TSP) is a newborn anti tank weapon.
sentences.chinese: 末敏弹是新一代反坦克武器。

sentences.english: Officials say an anti- tank shell struck the third floor ofthebuilding.
sentences.chinese: 官员还表示，一颗反坦克炮弓单攻击了大楼的第三层。

sentences.english: Here a Panther burns after being hit by British anti-tank weapons.
sentences.chinese: 图示一辆黑豹被英军反坦克武器击中后燃烧起火。

sentences.english: Other weapon systems can be installed including anti-tank guided missiles.
sentences.chinese: 其它的武器系统能被安装包括反坦克导弹。

sentences.english: I saw in the east and Tripoli field fortifications and anti-tank trenches.
sentences.chinese: 我看到的黎波里东面有野战工事和反坦克堑壕。
